long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
neetoTrail is an extension that allows users to take screenshots of web pages and save them as trails. The trails can be used to present the web pages as a series of screenshots during various staged of product development. It can be used to compare existing products in the market as well as go through the workflow of your product.

Once the extension is installed, go to the neetoTrail website to click on the "Add new trail" button. This will add two buttons to all the web pages opened on your browser. You can use those buttons to capture screenshots of the web pages. Once you have captured all the screenshots, you can upload them to neetoTail. Once the screenshots are uploaded, you can name the trail, delete or reorder the images and save the trail.
